use_custom_address_info: Ignore the receiving token type, always specify the recipient address manually
only_use_dex_info: Disable centralized exchanges and only use decentralized exchanges
enhance_privacy_info: Enhance privacy by delaying and randomize transaction time and amount.(TBD)
estimated_time_intro: The estimated time to wait until you receive your fund
cost_intro: Cost includes the bridge fee, gas fee and etc
making_blockchain_borderless_intro: Sending crypto across network has never been easier.
fast_like_a_rocket_intro: Through the most hassle free process, within a few clicks, the bridge process is done.
best_price_as_always_intro: By connecting to leading centralized exchanges, we provide the best price and the least slippage while the user remains anonymous against the exchanges.
privacy_guaranteed_intro: All the internal transaction history would be automatically removed after a certain period of time. And the public record are under Mixin kernel UTXO protection.
multichain_as_it_should_intro: Based on the powerful Mixin kenel, almost all public blockchain could be supported by the bridge. This makes it possible to connect all chains.
safe_decentralized_intro: By applying Mixin Safe for storing bridge assets and MTG for processing, the general safety of the bridge is higher than the classical MPC solutions,
view_address_intro1: The transfer will be confirmed after {number} blocks
view_address_intro2: Please transfer full amount at once!
